start:
Hello, i'm bot for download and search songs from yotuube music service.

You can just send me title of song or video link.

More info: /help
wait_download: This song is already being downloaded by another user, please try again in a while
download_message: The download has started please wait
long_video: I can't download music that lasts more than 12 minutes, it's a limitation Telegram bots :(
